GSOC Devlog

Tracking progress on the Mozilla Study Group Viz Project
  • week3
  • 18 June
    		•  Today is Father’s Day!! Let’s showcase the last week statistics using a Dashboard. After scanning dashboard templates, we choose Gentelella for our amazing Study Group! I started migrating my code to integrate with the dashboard template. PR#10- Dashboard Code Review
  • week2
  • 11 June
    		•  The statistics would be displayed using C3.js a chart library. This week, we decided on the types of graph to be used. Fetching the appropriate data and converting into JSON data for ease of access. We plotted 3 graphs: 1) Study Group Leaders vs Number of events 2) Types of Lessons taken by Study Group vs Number of lessons conducted 3) percentage of Levels of lessons (beginner, intermediate, advanced) We retrieved the data from Study Group Lessons
  • week1
  • 4 June
    		•  This is the beginning of the coding phase. Before starting the code obfuscation! I studied the repositories and had a list of data needed for the Study Group Dashboard. Cheers to Aurelia for keeping sg-event up to date!
